name: Meganoid
description: Meganoid is a challenging platformer, generating new levels on every play session. Find many items to enhance your character and his abilities while you descend down into the Meganoid space ship.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or higher 处理器: 2.0 ghz Dual Core 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间 声卡: OpenAL supported sound card
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or higher 处理器: 2.0 ghz Dual Core 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间 声卡: OpenAL supported sound card
